column2: Reconstructed Lahmia. Beautiful palace, looks like majestic citadel. Ancient temple of Blood recreated in its former glory and destination.
Our homeland is ours finally!Glory to queen!.
It is time to reconstruct our ancient capital.
Reconstruct whole city Lahmia, graceful palace, and temple of Blood
This lands are cursed by old necromantic magic, undead is just rises from sand. In our powers to stop it forever.
With necromantic powers, you can dispell old magic of Nagash in this region to stop infinite rises of undead from sand.
Dark rituals has do their work. The undead are resting.
